name: Endless "Snowflake"s
description:
The original plan was to give each snowflake its own unique snowflake image, by generating a whole batch of them with this cool hexagonal cellular automaton that I made. Sadly that didn't pan out, and I'm left with this. It's a husk of a game but if you're being very technical, it is a game.

WASD to move around, Space to jump, snowflakes will fly up and disappear when you touch them.
